welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gronau, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming city known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Gronau has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twente Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Twente Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Münster Osnabrück International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
